author: vinnie87
body:
Candidate release v1.2.5
Bug fixes and new features:
Bug Fix:
- Export indent errors
- export logic bug
  New features:
- Color code in prescales and smart prescales (sumamry view and
  Prescale view)
- clipboard (select and copy) on the prescales tab
- search field in the smart prescale view for smart prescale
  expressions in end path
title: Candidate release v1.2.5 (1.2.4 validation)
